title.narrative: Annual SDG 4-Education 2030 agenda (2018-2019), technical assistance, with the Ministry of Education in the scope of the Umbrella Cooperation Agreement

description.narrative: The agreement contributes to the development of several actions aimed at supporting Brazilian public policies in the fields of education, science and culture. In particular, the Umbrella Cooperation Agreement is a very valuable instrument for UNESCO to strengthen a strategic partnership with the Ministry of Education, especially because it is directly coordinated by the Minister's Executive Office and the Executive Secretary. The activities are designed aiming at supporting national efforts in improving universal access, equity and quality education in all schooling levels. Quality and equity remain a crucial challenge in Brazil as both are essential to respond to the needs of the country.
